function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased psychological health problems in the workplace","Impact":"Decreased productivity, poor mental health, increased anxiety and stress","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, counseling, and stress management programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, remote counseling services","People":"Construction workers, employees in the built environment","Owner":"Employers, human resources, and management"},{"Description":"Job insecurity and financial concerns leading to poor mental health","Impact":"Increased stress, anxiety, and decreased mental well-being","Mitigation":"Communicate openly about job security, provide financial resources and support","Technologies":"Financial planning tools, remote communication platforms","People":"Employees, workers in the construction industry","Owner":"Employers, financial advisors"}]}
